pages.title: Mana Relay
pages.text: The Mana Relay can be used to transfer $(l:e_mana_machine_mana)Mana/el over long distances and to power multiple blocks from one source. By default it can transfer $(l:e_mana_machine_mana)Mana/el up to 10 blocks.

To increase the range at which this block can operate, add a $(l:e_item_dimensional_crystal)Dimensional Crystal/el to it by right-clicking. $(l:e_mechanic_mana_linking)Linking/el this block with other blocks can be done with the help of a $(l:e_item_mana_linker)Mana Linker/el
